title: Project A
description: Used Java in Android Studio to build a mobile application that allowed users to enter recipes and photos of the food. It then saves it in a data based and displays recipes like a notes app.

title: Project B
description: Used Java in Android Studio to build a mobile application that allowed users to login and order Boba and allows an administrator to view all the orders and where they need to be delivered too.

title: Project C
description: An Inventory program that allows the user to order and sell items, also displays a report of how many items are present and what need to be reorder (used arrays, sorting functions, switch statements).
